segments.text: Oh my goodness, look at that water just pouring out of the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I've never seen anything like it, it's like a little waterfall in the kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems so calm, just drying her dishes like it's any other day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she knows that her feet are getting wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And those kids, they're being so brave, climbing up to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't fall, but they seem to be doing okay so far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy looks like he's got a good grip on the jar, he's being so careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is being so patient, waiting for her turn to get a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a little adventure for them, trying to get a snack without getting caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like I'm watching a little play, it's all so interesting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder what will happen next, it's all so unpredictable.
segments.speaker: PAR
